name: market for nuclear power plant, pressure water reactor, 650MW | nuclear power plant, pressure water reactor, 650MW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11827/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This dataset represents the market of pressure water nuclear plant based on the CANDU technology.  ;The CANDU (CANada Deuterium Uranium) technology was used to built this nuclear power plant. This nuclear technology is characterized by the use of heavy water as moderator and natural uranium as fuel. Source: http://www.candu.com/en/home/default.aspx;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a nuclear power plant, pressure water reactor, 650MW. The infrastructure has a lifetime of 30 years. Estimation based on data of the pressure water nuclear power plant in Quebec, Canada. The process includes building materials (steel, copper, titan, aluminium, concrete, asbestos cement, wood and paper, oil, diesel and heating oils etc.), their decommission, energy  requirements for the construction and land use.   for construction.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
